➡️ Broker rating – Is it safe?

Well, they don’t look good at all, we don’t think it’s a good idea to invest money with this type of company. We always recommend investing with duly regulated brokers and only with the most important regulatory bodies, why risk our money? 🚨 THE REGULATION OF A BROKER IS ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT CHARACTERISTICS, DON’T FORGET IT. 🚨

In addition to all the negative features mentioned above, IX Investors already has numerous complaints on the internet, clients commenting on negative experiences, it is an unregulated broker, negative reputation, European regulators have added this broker to their blacklist. ✋ ❌Do you really want to take the risk of investing with a broker with these characteristics? ✋ ❌

Some of the characteristics of this company for which we do not like: we do not know its location, too many customer complaints, non-existent regulation, with little history and trajectory, blacklisted by European regulators.
